channel.title: Setting Max Connections?
channel.description:
How do I set max connections for my server because when I tried doing it my server crashed at the amount of player i set it to...
Thanks ina dvance.

item.title: Setting Max Connections?
item.dc:creator: @Zilchary Zilchary
item.description:
@Zilchary wrote:

Nvm I found out, you’re maxplayers in playerhandler need to be more than ur maxconnections in server.java, thanks tho

Read full topic

item.title: Setting Max Connections?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

I’m not sure if this is a good idea. Someone I know done this and a message keeps popping up saying “The max amount of players is reached.” It gets really annoying and laggs your server.

Good luck on finding one though and when/if you do, don’t use one unless it stops messages from popping up.

Read full topic
